pistol.effect: +1 die when firing or maintaining pistols.

rifle.description: Proficiency with bolt-action and semi-automatic rifles.

shotgun.description: Training in pump-action and break-action shotguns.

smg.description: Proficiency with submachine guns and automatic pistol-caliber firearms.

melee.description: Skill with handheld and improvised melee weapons.

unarmed.description: Hand-to-hand combat techniques including boxing, wrestling, and street fighting.
unarmed.effect: +1 die in unarmed attacks or grapples.

explosives.description: Training in safe use of grenades and demolition charges.
explosives.effect: +1 die when using or placing explosives.

lockpicks.description: Proficiency with lockpicking tools and bypass techniques.

medicineKit.description: Training in basic medical tools such as bandages, gauze, disinfectants, and splints.

engineeringTools.description: Skill with mechanical tools such as wrenches, pliers, and repair kits.
engineeringTools.effect: +1 die when repairing or modifying machinery.

vehicleMaintenance.description: Training in automotive repair and upkeep.
vehicleMaintenance.effect: +1 die when fixing or assessing vehicular issues.

ritualTools.description: Familiarity with occult implements such as candles, chalk, charms, and ceremonial knives.
ritualTools.effect: +1 die when performing rituals or drawing sigils.

pharmaceuticals.description: Knowledge of medicines, injections, anesthetics, and controlled substances.
pharmaceuticals.effect: +1 die when administering drugs or determining their effects.

stealth.description: Training in silent movement and concealment.

interrogation.description: Structured questioning and pressure-based information extraction.

performance.description: Acting, singing, distracting, crowd control, and stage presence.
performance.effect: +1 die when performing or diverting attention.

tracking.description: Skill in following tracks, clues, and movement patterns.
tracking.effect: +1 die to pursuit or tracking attempts.

shadyDeals.description: Underworld negotiation, back-alley trading, and criminal connections.
shadyDeals.effect: +1 die when conducting illegal deals or bargaining.

disguise.description: Acting, impersonation, and alteration of appearance.
disguise.effect: +1 die when using disguises or false identities.

loreFolklore.description: Understanding of myths, urban legends, regional stories, and supernatural folklore.
loreFolklore.effect: +1 die when identifying or recalling folklore about creatures or places.

loreScience.description: Academic scientific understanding including chemistry, physics, and biology.
loreScience.effect: +1 die when applying scientific principles to a problem.
